packagedElement.name: Revenue Assurance ABE
packagedElement.publish:qualifiedname: SID Models::Enterprise Domain::Enterprise Risk ABE::Revenue Assurance ABE

publish:property.name: Qualified Name
publish:property.publish:value: SID Models::Enterprise Domain::Enterprise Risk ABE::Revenue Assurance ABE

ownedComment.body: The Revenue Assurance area of the SID provides revenue assurance controls, revenue assurance violations, revenue assurance key performance indicators (KPIs), revenue assurance objectives, and rules that map revenue assurance KPIs and threshold violations to revenue assurance trouble tickets. Additionally, the scope of Revenue Assurance includes revenue assurance actions/responses that reconcile revenue assurance trouble tickets and bring the trouble tickets to closure.
ownedComment.name: <Unnamed Comment>
ownedComment.publish:qualifiedname: SID Models::Enterprise Domain::Enterprise Risk ABE::Revenue Assurance ABE::<Comment>

publish:property.name: Body
publish:property.publish:value: The Revenue Assurance area of the SID provides revenue assurance controls, revenue assurance violations, revenue assurance key performance indicators (KPIs), revenue assurance objectives, and rules that map revenue assurance KPIs and threshold violations to revenue assurance trouble tickets. Additionally, the scope of Revenue Assurance includes revenue assurance actions/responses that reconcile revenue assurance trouble tickets and bring the trouble tickets to closure.
